title: 181: Great Expectations
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this episode, we discuss Charles Dickens's "Great Expectations." But you know, if you keep your expectations low, it's harder to be disappointed. I guess, in a way, that's the point of this book.
itunes:author: Pip, Joe, and Pocket
itunes:subtitle: though I prefer medium expectations
itunes:summary: In this episode, we discuss Charles Dickens's "Great Expectations." But you know, if you keep your expectations low, it's harder to be disappointed. I guess, in a way, that's the point of this book.
